vote.title: To Recognize Dale D. Tucker, Sr.’s 8th Pastoral Anniversary at Triedstone Baptist Church
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize Dale D. Tucker, Sr.’s 8th Pastoral Anniversary at Triedstone Baptist Church
 
Body
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus is proud to recognize the dedication and service of Pastor Dale D. Tucker, Sr., leader of Triedstone Baptist Church, as he celebrates his 8th Pastoral Anniversary on February 23, 2025; and
WHEREAS, Pastor Dale D. Tucker, Sr. has been an inspiring leader, connecting people to Christ, making Disciples, and advancing the kingdom of God, aligning with the church’s mission of “GO, GROW, AND GIVE GOD GLORY”; and
WHEREAS, Tucker, Sr.’s work through the Music and Arts Ministries continues to serve as a beacon of hope and spiritual growth for saved and unsaved individuals; and
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus recognizes the tireless service of Triedstone Baptist Church to the local community, exemplified through its commitment to personal evangelism, missionary programs, Christian education, and outreach initiatives that have transformed lives and has made a lasting impact in our neighborhoods and beyond; and
WHEREAS, Pastor Dale D. Tucker, Sr., a native of Columbus, Ohio, has faithfully served Triedstone Baptist Church in numerous capacities, from Junior Deacon to Executive Pastor, and now leads as the Overseer of Media, Public Relations, and Technology for Kingdom Connection Fellowship International, while also impacting the community as an educator and Principal at Patriot Preparatory Academy; and 
WHEREAS, his leadership continues to guide individuals toward a deeper connection with their faith while inspiring the broader Columbus community through his unwavering commitment to service; now, therefore
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby recognizes and celebrates Pastor Dale D. Tucker, Sr.’s 8th Pastoral anniversary and all the achievements he and Triedstone Baptist Church have made to the City of Columbus.
